about_the_game:
NOTE BEFORE YOU BUY: to play this game You need a keyboard or a gamepad XBOX style, the game uses 5/6 buttons (5 or 6 depending on character's moveset) and some VR controllers don't have 5/6 buttons, that's why to play this game a keyboard or a gamepad are required. In case Your controllers have A B X Y buttons and right left grip then You can use also the VR controllers.

KNOWN ISSUE AND WORKAROUND: in case the screen should stay black then You need to set STEAM as XR default engine.

------- let's go with officiale description and presentation of the game

This is the VR edition of the game FIGHT FOR YOUR RESURRECTION available on the store

You are dead, but it is Your lucky death: sometimes to those who dies is given the possibility to FIGHT FOR RESURRECTION!!! in the after death realm devils and demons are bored, they want enjoy some fight to the death(again) ... and Your death is one of that lucky one in which You can choose a new body, fight 10 matches, and if You survive then You can keep Your new body and resurrect ... are You willing to accept the challenge?

The game has dynamic A.I.: every time You loose a match the difficult level decrease, every two consecutive matches that You win the difficult increase, the range is VERYEASY EASY NORMAL HARD VERYHARD IMPOSSIBLE - I dare You to complete all the 10 matches never loosing a fight :D


A NOTE FROM DEVELOPER
after a while playing the game You'll notice that all the characters have similar movements, in fact there are only 2 movesets in this first release: make custom moveset for each character is a big effort, so here a deal: the price of the first release of the game is cheap, You show some love for it, and I'll make custom moveset for each character soon in a free update.

content_descriptors.notes: Adult content: blood (red liquid like) when characters are defeated; monsters and demons depicted; fight and combat
